_comment_1: for OPENSHIFT_DOMAIN provide the values for subdomain and domain in the below given format (eg. api.ocp.twentynet.local)
_comment_2: OPENSHIFT_PORT for OCP web cluster console port number
_comment_3: The below list operators are deployed & validated based on payload
_comment_4: provide the name of the project created in the OpenShift GUI, if no project is created use 'default' project name
_comment_5: provide the OC client tool path if it has not been added to the path (eg. /root/ocp/). If the OC client path has been added then leave the below field empty
_comment_6: provide the storage class name to be used by the cluster logging operator
